About Me





I'm an Instrumentation and Control Engineering graduate from the University of Delhi, Netaji Subhas Institute of Technology. My major research interests interests are in the field of Embedded Systems, Analog Circuit Design, Machine Learning and Biomimetic/Neuromorphic Circuits.
I DIY enthusiast and have been tinkering with microcontrollers since my sophomore days.
I am looking forward to pursuing Masters in Electrical and Computer Engineering with specialization in Analog VLSI and/or Embedded Systems.
